meanings.definition: Gerenuks: a type of African antelope with long necks and legs
meanings.sent1: The gerenuks gracefully moved across the savannah, their long necks reaching for leaves.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of gerenuks at the watering hole, elegantly standing on their hind legs.
meanings.sent3: The gerenuks decided to have a race to see who could stretch their neck the farthest!
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the gerenuks resembled elegant statues with their elongated bodies.
meanings.sent5: The gerenuks' unique appearance makes them stand out among other antelopes.

meanings.definition: Gerenuks: plural form of gerenuk, referring to multiple individuals of the species
meanings.sent1: A herd of gerenuks grazed peacefully in the grasslands, each one enjoying the fresh vegetation.
meanings.sent2: The gerenuks gathered together under the shade of a tree, their long legs blending into the surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The gerenuks held a meeting to discuss the best grazing spots in the area.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the silhouettes of the gerenuks against the horizon created a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The gerenuks moved in unison, a synchronized dance of nature in the wild.
